algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the scores for the bins by taking the reciprocal of the absolute differences between each value and the item size, summing up all the reciprocal differences, and dividing the scores by the maximum capacity.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    reciprocal_diff = np.reciprocal(np.abs(bins - item))
    sum_reciprocal_diff = np.sum(reciprocal_diff)
    scores = sum_reciprocal_diff / np.max(bins)
    
    return scores
